query: WITH entities AS (SELECT approval_process_id, id FROM core_credit_facility_proposals WHERE ((approval_process_id IS NOT DISTINCT FROM $3) AND COALESCE(id < $2, true) OR COALESCE(approval_process_id < $3, approval_process_id IS NOT NULL)) ORDER BY approval_process_id DESC NULLS LAST, id DESC LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $4 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_credit_facility_proposal_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.approval_process_id desc nulls last, i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
